sentences.en: At higher speeds , a larger amount of fuel tends to be discharged from the main nozzle.
sentences.cn: 在较高转速时.主喷嘴会喷出大量的燃油.

sentences.en: Colorful and Print smooth and efficient water - resistant, does not plug nozzle.
sentences.cn: 色彩艳丽、打印流畅、快干耐水 、 不堵塞喷头.

sentences.en: He pointed the nozzle of the fire distinguisher at the flames.
sentences.cn: 他将灭火器的喷嘴对着火焰.

sentences.en: If he put his finger over the nozzle he could produce a forceful spray.
sentences.cn: 如果他把手指按在喷嘴上，就可以产生强力的喷射。

sentences.en: Its discovery engendered the'sudden freezing " approximation for relaxing nozzle flows.
sentences.cn: 这一事实的发现导致了松驰喷管流动 “ 突然冻结 ” 的近似概念.

sentences.en: Its nozzle was smeared with some kind of lubricant.
sentences.cn: 它的喷嘴抹了某种润滑油。

sentences.en: Our company is a business SMT Xizui ( NOZZLE ) accessories and supplies of the main suppliers.
sentences.cn: 我公司是一家经营SMT吸嘴 ( NOZZLE ) 配件及耗材的为主供应商.

sentences.en: She longed to clout him in the nozzle.
sentences.cn: 她真想猛揍一下他的鼻子.

sentences.en: She turned the nozzle and the spray concentrated down to a stream.
sentences.cn: 她掉转喷嘴,让水花集中喷入小河.

sentences.en: The nozzle first narrows, then flares out.
sentences.cn: 排气管口先是变窄, 然后渐渐张大.

sentences.en: The nozzle is fitted with a protective sleeve which can be replaced when it is worn.
sentences.cn: 喷咀上装有保护套,磨损后可以更换.

sentences.en: The reclamation nozzle captures a portion of the spent driver gas.
sentences.cn: 回收喷管收集一部分用过的驱动气体.

sentences.en: The rubber nozzle is all cracked.
The truncated nozzle is found to have a higher thrust.
sentences.cn: 截断的喷管具有较大的推力.

sentences.en: With succulent, herbaceous , species, water pressure at the nozzle is critical.
sentences.cn: 对肉食植物 、 草本植物来说, 喷头的水位要求很严格.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 喷灯嘴；燃烧器喷嘴
喷嘴面积；喷嘴截面面积

trans.tran_en: a part that is fitted to the end of a hose, pipe etc to direct and control the stream of liquid or gas pouring out
